alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 9:00PM AKST until February 25 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: A surface low remains along the NE Gulf Coast this evening bringing bands of moderate to heavy snow at times over the panhandle. The bulk of precipitation has moved SE of Yakutat and now blankets the Central and Southern Panhandle. As the low continues to shift S along the coast, an enhanced band of heavier snow will develop over the Central Panhandle and move S through late tonight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Chichagof Island and Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait including Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Elfin Cove, and Pelican. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult due to reduced visibility and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest rates are expected Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; Eastern Chichagof Island
